item.title: Tesla Prices New Model Y With Eye on Luring Chinese Families
item.description: Tesla Inc. priced its updated, six-seat Model Y sport utility vehicle in the same range as local rival Li Auto Inc.’s extended-range L8 model, to win over middle-class families in China’s hyper-compet
